citeinfo.origin: UCAR, Joint Office for Science Support (JOSS), Joint Office for Science Support
citeinfo.title: STORM-FEST SAO Special Observations

descript.abstract: Wind direction/speed, ceiling height, visibility. dry bulb temperature, wet bulb temperature, dew point temperature, sea level and station pressure, cloud data, and present weather. Manual and automatic observations for special conditions that arose at about 1200 NWS, FAA, Coast Guard, and DOD sites for STORM-FEST.

idinfo.accconst: Check with Contributor about how to obtain data.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
